subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Initially suspended for the first half against No. 22 Clemson, the Heisman-winning quarterback will now sit the entire game for making an obscene comment in the student union.
snippet: Initially suspended for the first half against No. 22 Clemson, the Heisman-winning quarterback will now sit the entire game for making an obscene comment in the student union.
